front.title: Multiple NFSv4 Domain Namespace Deployment Guidelines

abstract.t: This document provides guidance on the deployment of the NFSv4 protocols for the construction of an NFSv4 file name space in environments with multiple NFSv4 Domains. To participate in an NFSv4 mulit-domain file name space, the server must offer a mulit-domain capable file system and support RPCSEC_GSS for user authentication. In most instances, the server must also support identity mapping services.
